conversation.text: You can find general medical help at https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate  and psychological help at https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees  If neither of those fit your needs, you can also call a help hotline which is can be found at https://dopomoha.ro/en/call-center
conversation.in_response_to: Where can I seek medical attention?
